[
    Expression {
        expression: StaticMethodCall {
            target: Identifier(
                SimpleIdentifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        value: "Foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            span: Span(
                1,
                10,
            ),
            method: Variable(
                VariableVariable(
                    VariableVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            12,
                        ),
                        variable: SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    13,
                                ),
                                name: "a",
                            },
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
            arguments: ArgumentList {
                start: Span(
                    1,
                    15,
                ),
                arguments: [],
                end: Span(
                    1,
                    16,
                ),
            },
        },
        end: Span(
            1,
            17,
        ),
    },
]
